properties.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 4 at 9:01AM PST until February 5 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 17 expected.

* WHERE...Antelope Valley.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Damage to outdoor plumbing possible. Expect severe
damage to crops or sensitive vegetation, and harm to unprotected
pets or livestock.
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY
